{"step_by_step_thinking": "Facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy (FSHD) is a genetic muscle disorder in which the muscles of the face, shoulder blades, and upper arms are among the most affected. Currently, there is no cure for FSHD. The treatment is focused on managing symptoms and improving quality of life through physical therapy, occupational therapy, and sometimes surgery. However, these are not treatments that can cure the disease, but rather manage its symptoms.", "answer_choice": "B. no"}
